npcs.name: Diggin Diggs
utterances: You're looking a might shabby there.  You could use some fine armor from Diggs' inventory.  I carry only the finest quality and sell at outrageously low, low prices!  I live for the community.

npcs.name: Dondl Fuzzlecutter
utterances: ...The tract-o-fizzle attaches to the wizgiggler.  Or is it the other way around?  What do you think my friend?

npcs.name: Fillzer Fuzzle
utterances: Not now, I'm looking for treasure!

npcs.name: Ganla Dindlenod
utterances: What brings you to the fair vale of Baubbleshire? Seeking a bit of merriment among the stouts?

npcs.name: Jayla Midhop
utterances: Sorry, I'd prefer not to talk right now.

npcs.name: Peona Toughins
utterances: Dare I say, it's a fine day for shopping. How can I help you?
You can never be too careful when it comes to protecting yourself. Why not try something new?

npcs.name: Pirnook Valewine
utterances: Oh! Excuse me for not recognizing your face.  I've only just arrived.  You know, this place is nice enough, but it still doesn't compare to the Vale ... Aaah, I guess I'll just have to make the best of it.
Oh, I just miss the Vale terribly, and I know that I'll never see it again. It'll never be as it was before, well, before I came here, anyway.
You're ... you're right, I do, but I'm hesitant. I think that if I talk about it ... if someone else knows what I've seen, then ... then it'll be real.  I don't want it to be real.

Well ... I ... I can't, I just can't describe the things I've seen. I can tell you what I feel, and what I think, I suppose.  Yes, it's better this way.  The world should know that the Vale ... well, it just might not be there anymore, at least not in the way we know it.

Oh, I know. But you see, Rivervale and the Misty Thicket were special; they weren't harmed in the Cataclysms!  Somehow our lands survived unscathed!  It was a paradise when the rest of the world was broken and shattered.

Yes. It did.  Something is happening in the vale at this very moment!  It's ... it's terrible!  I just ... I just don't want to think about it!  I can't!  I'm really very sorry, but I just can't.  Not yet.  I need time, just a little time for the nightmares to go away...

I know, I know, but you haven't seen what I've seen!  You haven't heard the screams in the night!  Oh, those ghastly, horrific screams of pain and ... and merriment!  Cries of merriment in the slaughter!  It's ... it's happening now!  Right now!  They're suffering and I can't help them!  No one can help them!

Death and suffering!  All of them dead and suffering!  They ... they bring it!  They revel in it!  It's like wine and song to them!  They're beyond evil, and they won't stop until they reave every last bit of life from the land!

Terrible, horrible things in the night.  They shriek and howl, and then they sing softly and tenderly and sooth the nightmares away.  They're here for all of us; they won't stop until they've drained all life away.  Oh no, Launa!  My sweet Launa!  She's still there!  I abandoned her!  I had to, my sweet Launa, I had to ...  you were lost to them, but I couldn't do it!  I just couldn't do it!  Oh, please forgive me...

npcs.name: Rala Eurocarry
utterances: You have learned everything I have to teach at the moment.  You are free to use our crafting facilities to hone your skills.

npcs.name: Rebik Sprocketrock
utterances: Well met, good friend!  I'm  busy working on this new lock here!  I think it'll be unpickable once I'm done!

npcs.name: Remo Zigg
utterances: Leave me alone!

npcs.name: Sage Xoort
utterances: Hello there!  How can I be of service?

npcs.name: Smithy Findlebop
utterances: Is there something you need to have custom made?  I can see if I can get one of my lads to look into it!
Now, if I can only figure out how the sprocket will fit in this device, I'll be set! Why are you interrupting my work?  Can't you see I'm busy?

npcs.name: Tawli Whiskwind
utterances: Good day to you, deary!  I make the most wonderful brooms--strong bristles, stout handles, and quite stylish if you ask me.  Great for sweeping off your doorstep or scaring off little critters!

npcs.name: Wazzleburn
utterances: All right where is my pen?  How am I supposed to scribe anything without my pen?
Be careful, it's best not to read the scrolls.  If you want to know what they are, just ask me.
Blast it! Who keeps taking all of the parchment?

npcs.name: Yola Sindlefop
utterances: Hello there!  Isn't this a lovely spot?  It's not the vale, but I was too young to really remember much when we left anyway.

npcs.name: Zipiff Clamorclang
utterances: Careful where you walk!   I don't want you bending a sprocket or tweaking a spring, and you mustn't crimp a cog!  If I have to uncrimp just one more cog...
